name: Rise of Liberty
description: Rise of Liberty is a single-player massive Revolutionary War battle simulator. Fire deafening cannons into the thick of the battle, stand in line formation and fire devastating volleys into the enemy. Gather your men for these monumental battles and defeat the enemy!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: 1.7 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: intel hd graphics Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any Additional Notes: Minimum Resolution 720p
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: 3 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 950 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Any
